value.string:
getUid
 query
 omit_input
 omit_output
 resource_uid:list
 from_date
 at_date
 to_date
 transaction_simulation_state:list
 transaction_section_category
 transaction_portal_type:list
 node_uid:list
 hide_grouping=""
 resource_uid=""
 stat

<dtml-if getUid>
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.total_price), 0.00) AS total_price,
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.quantity), 0.00) AS quantity
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT child.uid AS uid
 , child.path AS path
 , stock.date AS date
 , stock.node_uid AS account_uid
 , catalog.reference AS parent_reference
 , mirror_section.title AS section_title
 , IF(stock.section_uid = delivery.source_section_uid,
 catalog.source_reference,
 catalog.destination_reference) AS parent_specific_reference
 , catalog.portal_type AS portal_type
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity > 0,
 stock.quantity, 0)), 0.00) AS debit
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity < 0,
 - stock.quantity, 0)), 0.00) AS credit
 , IFNULL(SUM(stock.quantity), 0.00) AS balance
 <dtml-else>
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.total_price > 0,
 stock.total_price, 0)), 0.00) AS debit
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.total_price < 0,
 - stock.total_price, 0)), 0.00) AS credit
 , IFNULL(SUM(stock.total_price), 0.00) AS balance
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 FROM
 stock
 , catalog AS child
 , catalog
 , catalog AS node
 , category AS node_category
 , category AS section_category
 , catalog AS mirror_section
 , delivery
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE stock.mirror_section_uid = <dtml-var getUid>
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND child.portal_type <> "Simulation Movement"
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 AND node.uid = node_category.uid
 AND stock.section_uid = section_category.uid
 AND section_category.uid = mirror_section.uid
 AND (node_category.category_uid = <dtml-var
 expr="getPortalObject().portal_categories.account_type.asset.receivable.getUid()">
 OR node_category.category_uid = <dtml-var
 expr="getPortalObject().portal_categories.account_type.liability.payable.getUid()">
 )
 AND node_category.category_strict_membership = 1
 <dtml-if transaction_portal_type>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_portal_type>
 catalog.portal_type = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in node_uid>
 stock.node_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 stock.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.total_price > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.total_price < 0
 </dtml-if>
 AND stock.total_price != 0
 <dtml-if transaction_simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_simulation_state>
 catalog.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_section_category>
 AND section_category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var expr="portal_categories.resolveCategory(transaction_section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if hide_grouping>
 AND (child.grouping_reference IS NULL or child.grouping_reference = "")
 </dtml-if hide_grouping>
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-unless stat>
 GROUP BY catalog.uid, stock.node_uid
 </dtml-unless>
 ORDER BY stock.date, child.uid
 </dtml-if>

<dtml-if getUid>
 SELECT
 <dtml-if stat>
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.total_price), 0.00) AS total_price,
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.quantity), 0.00) AS quantity
 <dtml-else>
 DISTINCT child.uid AS uid
 , child.path AS path
 , stock.date AS date
 , stock.node_uid AS account_uid
 , catalog.reference AS parent_reference
 , mirror_section.title AS section_title
 , IF(stock.section_uid = delivery.source_section_uid,
 catalog.source_reference,
 catalog.destination_reference) AS parent_specific_reference
 , catalog.portal_type AS portal_type
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity > 0,
 stock.quantity, 0)), 0.00) AS debit
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.quantity < 0,
 - stock.quantity, 0)), 0.00) AS credit
 , IFNULL(SUM(stock.quantity), 0.00) AS balance
 <dtml-else>
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.total_price > 0,
 stock.total_price, 0)), 0.00) AS debit
 , IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock.total_price < 0,
 - stock.total_price, 0)), 0.00) AS credit
 , IFNULL(SUM(stock.total_price), 0.00) AS balance
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 FROM
 stock
 , catalog AS child
 , catalog
 , catalog AS node
 , category AS node_category
 , category AS section_category
 , catalog AS mirror_section
 , delivery
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE stock.mirror_section_uid = <dtml-var getUid>
 AND child.uid = stock.uid
 AND delivery.uid = catalog.uid
 AND child.parent_uid = catalog.uid
 AND child.portal_type <> "Simulation Movement"
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 AND node.uid = node_category.uid
 AND stock.section_uid = section_category.uid
 AND section_category.uid = mirror_section.uid
 AND (node_category.category_uid = <dtml-var
 expr="getPortalObject().portal_categories.account_type.asset.receivable.getUid()">
 OR node_category.category_uid = <dtml-var
 expr="getPortalObject().portal_categories.account_type.liability.payable.getUid()">
 )
 AND node_category.category_strict_membership = 1
 <dtml-if transaction_portal_type>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_portal_type>
 catalog.portal_type = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if node_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in node_uid>
 stock.node_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 stock.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.total_price > 0
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.total_price < 0
 </dtml-if>
 AND stock.total_price != 0
 <dtml-if transaction_simulation_state>
 AND (
 <dtml-in transaction_simulation_state>
 catalog.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if transaction_section_category>
 AND section_category.category_uid =
 <dtml-var expr="portal_categories.resolveCategory(transaction_section_category).getUid()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if hide_grouping>
 AND (child.grouping_reference IS NULL or child.grouping_reference = "")
 </dtml-if hide_grouping>
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-unless stat>
 GROUP BY catalog.uid, stock.node_uid
 </dtml-unless>
 ORDER BY stock.date, child.uid
 </dtml-if>
